title: The Swinging 1960s
description: Peace, love, and how much do you remember? Test your knowledge of the groovy '60s!

questions.question: Which band led the 'British Invasion' when they appeared on The Ed Sullivan Show in 1964?
questions.hint: 73 million Americans tuned in to watch them perform.

questions.question: What iconic outdoor music festival took place in 1969?
questions.hint: Three days of peace and music in upstate New York.

questions.question: Who gave the famous 'I Have a Dream' speech in 1963?
questions.hint: He spoke at the March on Washington.

questions.question: What TV show featured a family of castaways on a deserted island?
questions.hint: Just sit right back and you'll hear a tale...
